sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { useLoan } from '../contexts/LoanContext'; import { CurrencyDollarIcon, ClockIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon, ChartBarIcon, PlusIcon, ArrowRightIcon, EyeIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import LoadingSpinner from '../components/LoadingSpinner'; import TimeSimulator from '../components/TimeSimulator'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user, isAdmin } = useAuth(); const { dashboardData, fetchDashboardData, loading } = useLoan(); const [recentLoans, setRecentLoans] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { if (user) { fetchDashboardData(); fetchRecentLoans(); } }, [user]); const fetchRecentLoans = async () => { try { const { fetchLoans } = useLoan(); const loans = await fetchLoans(); setRecentLoans(loans.slice(0, 5)); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching recent loans:', error); } }; const formatCurrency = (amount) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-IN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'INR', minimumFractionDigits: 0, maximumFractionDigits: 0, }).format(amount); }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'ACTIVE': return 'text-green-600 bg-green-100'; case 'COMPLETED': return 'text-blue-600 bg-blue-100'; case 'PENDING_BORROWER_ACCEPT': return 'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-100'; case 'DEFAULT_REPORTED': return 'text-red-600 bg-red-100'; default: return 'text-gray-600 bg-gray-100'; } }; if (loading) { return (
); } return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome back, {user?.name}!

Here's an overview of your PaySafe activity

{/* Time Simulator (Admin only) */} {isAdmin && (
)} {/* KYC Status Alert */} {user?.kycStatus !== 'VERIFIED' && (

KYC Verification Required

Complete your KYC verification to start lending and borrowing.

Complete KYC →
)} {/* Dashboard Cards */} {dashboardData && (
{/* Wallet Balance */}

Wallet Balance

{formatCurrency(dashboardData.wallet.balance)}

{/* Loans Given */}

Loans Given

{dashboardData.loansGiven.total}

{formatCurrency(dashboardData.loansGiven.totalAmount)}

{/* Loans Taken */}

Loans Taken

{dashboardData.loansTaken.total}

{formatCurrency(dashboardData.loansTaken.outstanding)} outstanding

{/* Overdue */}

Overdue

{dashboardData.overdue.count}

{formatCurrency(dashboardData.overdue.amount)}

)} {/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Lend Money
Borrow Money
CIBIL Reports
{/* Upcoming Checkpoints */}

Upcoming Checkpoints

{dashboardData?.upcomingCheckpoints?.length > 0 ? (
{dashboardData.upcomingCheckpoints.slice(0, 3).map((checkpoint, index) => (

Block {checkpoint.blockNumber}

Due: {new Date(checkpoint.blockEndDate).toLocaleDateString()}

{formatCurrency(checkpoint.minPayment)}

min payment

))}
) : (

No upcoming checkpoints

)}
{/* Recent Loans */}

Recent Loans

{recentLoans.length > 0 ? (
{recentLoans.map((loan) => ( ))}
Loan ID Type Amount Status Date Actions
{loan.id} {loan.lenderId === user.id ? 'Lent' : 'Borrowed'} {formatCurrency(loan.principal)} {loan.status.replace('_', ' ')} {new Date(loan.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()} View
) : (

No loans yet

Lend Money Borrow Money
)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
